description:
* Multiple VPN protocols/encryption types
* Innovative Elliptic Curve Cryptography, AES-GCM and obfuscation support
* No activity logs
* No speed limit
* Multiple speed optimizations
* SecureProxy browser addon included
* 6 simultaneous connections
* Truly secure DNS services
* VPN Software for Windows, Mac, iOS and Android
* Compatible with many other devices
* Multiple countries: 21 (VPN), 32 (SecureProxy)

When you run VPN.ac for the first time, you will see the TAP-Windows installing window.
This offers you the option to use OpenVPN.
author: vpn.ac
